Text:
It is NOT the film described in the torrent description, [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112933/]"El Efecto Mariposa"[/url], originally in Spanish and by director Fernando Colomo.

Instead, it's a Spanish dub of the American film [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0289879/]"The Butterfly Effect"[/url]
with Aston Kutcher.

So don't download unless that's what you want.
